ArticleSpec.title: ISA95MaterialDataType
ArticleSpec.description: Defines a material resource, a quantity, an optional description, and an optional collection of properties.

MaterialClassID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Class is not used to identify the material.

MaterialDefinitionID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Definition is not used to identify the material.

MaterialLotID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Lot is not used to identify the material.

MaterialSublotID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Sublot is not used to identify the material.

Description.description: Additional information and description about the resource.

MaterialUse.description: Information about the expected use of the material, see the ISA 95 Part 2 standard for defined values.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the quantity

Properties.description: Any associated properties, or empty if there are no properties defined.

items.title: ISA95PropertyDataType
items.description: A subtype of OPC UA Structure that defines two linked data items: an ID, which is a unique identifier for a property within the scope of the associated resource, and the value, which is the data for the property.

ID.description: Unique identifier for a property within the scope of the associated resource

Description.description: An optional description of the parameter.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the value

items.description: Stand-in for the infinite remainder of this data structure, which is recursively defined.

items.description: Stand-in for the infinite remainder of this data structure, which is recursively defined.

Unknown.description: Unknown state. Used when result is not known, e.g. because job order is still running.

Unsuccessful.description: Job order was not executed successful.

AssetId.description: To be used by end users to store a unique identification in the context of their overall application. Servers shall support at least 40 Unicode characters for the clients writing this value, this means clients can expect to be able to write strings with a length of 40 Unicode characters into that field.

JobOrderID.description: Contains information defining the job order with all parameters and any material, equipment, or physical asset requirements associated with the order.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.

JobOrderID.description: Contains information defining the job order with all parameters and any material, equipment, or physical asset requirements associated with the order.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.

JobOrderID.description: Contains information defining the job order with all parameters and any material, equipment, or physical asset requirements associated with the order.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.

JobOrderID.description: Contains information defining the job order with all parameters and any material, equipment, or physical asset requirements associated with the order.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.

JobOrderID.description: Contains information defining the job order with all parameters and any material, equipment, or physical asset requirements associated with the order.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.

JobOrderID.description: Contains information defining the job order with all parameters and any material, equipment, or physical asset requirements associated with the order.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.

JobOrder.title: ISA95JobOrderDataType
JobOrder.description: Defines the information needed to schedule and execute a job.

JobOrderID.description: An identification of the Job Order.

Description.description: Addition information about the Job Order The array allows to provide descriptions in different languages.

WorkMasterID.description: Work Master associated with the job order. If multiple work masters are defined, then the execution system can select the work master based on the availability of resources.

items.title: ISA95WorkMasterDataType
items.description: Defines a Work Master ID and the defined parameters for the Work Master.

ID.description: An identification of the Work Master.

Description.description: Additional information and description about the Work Master.

Parameters.description: Defined parameters for the Work Master.

items.title: ISA95ParameterDataType
items.description: A subtype of OPC UA Structure that defines three linked data items: the ID, which is a unique identifier for a property, the value, which is the data that is identified, and an optional description of the parameter.

ID.description: A unique identifier for a parameter

Description.description: An optional description of the parameter. The array allows to provide descriptions in different languages when writing. When accessing, the server shall only provide one entry in the array.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the value

items.description: Stand-in for the infinite remainder of this data structure, which is recursively defined.

StartTime.description: The proposed start time for the order, may be empty if not specified

EndTime.description: The proposed end time for the order, may be empty if not specified

Priority.description: The priority of the job order, may be empty of not specified. Higher numbers have higher priority.  This type allows the Job Order clients to pick their own ranges, and the Job Order server only has to pick the highest number.

JobOrderParameters.description: Key value pair with values, not associated with a resource that is provided as part of the job order, may be empty if not specified.

items.title: ISA95ParameterDataType
items.description: A subtype of OPC UA Structure that defines three linked data items: the ID, which is a unique identifier for a property, the value, which is the data that is identified, and an optional description of the parameter.

ID.description: A unique identifier for a parameter

Description.description: An optional description of the parameter. The array allows to provide descriptions in different languages when writing. When accessing, the server shall only provide one entry in the array.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the value

items.description: Stand-in for the infinite remainder of this data structure, which is recursively defined.

PersonnelRequirements.description: A specification of any personnel requirements associated with the job order, may be empty if not specified

items.title: ISA95PersonnelDataType
items.description: Defines a personnel resource or a person, a quantity, an optional description, and an optional collection of properties.

ID.description: An identification of a Personnel Class or Person.

Description.description: Additional information and description about the resource.

PersonnelUse.description: Information about the expected use of the personnel, see the ISA 95 Part 2 standard for defined values.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the quantity

Properties.description: Any associated properties, or empty if there are no properties defined.

MaterialRequirements.description: A specification of any material requirements associated with the job order, may be empty if not specified.

items.title: ISA95MaterialDataType
items.description: Defines a material resource, a quantity, an optional description, and an optional collection of properties.

MaterialClassID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Class is not used to identify the material.

MaterialDefinitionID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Definition is not used to identify the material.

MaterialLotID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Lot is not used to identify the material.

MaterialSublotID.description: An identification of the resource, or null if the Material Sublot is not used to identify the material.

Description.description: Additional information and description about the resource.

MaterialUse.description: Information about the expected use of the material, see the ISA 95 Part 2 standard for defined values.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the quantity

Properties.description: Any associated properties, or empty if there are no properties defined.

items.title: ISA95PropertyDataType
items.description: A subtype of OPC UA Structure that defines two linked data items: an ID, which is a unique identifier for a property within the scope of the associated resource, and the value, which is the data for the property.

ID.description: Unique identifier for a property within the scope of the associated resource

Description.description: An optional description of the parameter.

EngineeringUnits.title: EUInformation
EngineeringUnits.description: The Unit Of Measure of the value

items.description: Stand-in for the infinite remainder of this data structure, which is recursively defined.

Comment.description: The comment provides a description of why the method was called. In order to provide the comment in several languages, it is an array of LocalizedText. The array may be empty, when no comment is provided.

ReturnStatus.description: Returns the status of the method execution.
